actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 10:00 a.m. on February 14, 2023.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on February 9, 2023, at 4:58 p.m.: Appointments: Commission on Reform and Modernization of the Department of State; Joint Committee on Taxation; and the Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe (Helsinki Commission) during the 118th Congress.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Patrick T. McHenry to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
